title: Open World Orchestral RPG Music Pack Vol.2
description: Continue your epic adventure with this new orchestral music pack, which is perfect for the story-driven games.
longDescription:
Demo part 1 (tracks 1-9)

Demo part 2​ (tracks 10-17)


Continue your epic adventure with this new orchestral music pack!

This pack is the sequel to the Open World Orchestral RPG Music Pack, and it features:

  • Open-world RPGs
  • Fantasy games
  • Adventure games
  • Story-driven games


Tracklist:

  1. The City of the Ancients - a majestic theme, evoking the grandeur of an ancient civilization.
  2. The City of the Ancients before the Dawn - a more tranquil version of the first track, creating an atmosphere of predawn peace.
  3. Fables of the Vanished Worlds - a mysterious and enchanting melody, telling stories of lost civilizations.
  4. Dragon's Keep - a heroic theme, perfect for battles against fearsome dragons.
  5. Dragon's Keep in the Night - a darker version of the fourth track, creating an atmosphere of suspense and danger.
  6. The Wilds - a carefree and adventurous theme, perfect for exploring vast wildernesses.
  7. The Nocturne Wilds - a more ethereal and mysterious version of the sixth track, creating an atmosphere of wonder and discovery.
  8. Whispers of Dreamland - a lullaby-like theme, perfect for peaceful moments or dream sequences.
  9. Melody of Verdant Paths - an upbeat and optimistic theme, perfect for journeying through lush forests and green meadows.
  10. Underwater Dawn - A serene and tranquil composition, echoing the gentle awakening of life beneath the waves, as the sun's first rays pierce through the water's surface.
  11. New Lands - A theme of exploration and discovery, capturing the excitement and anticipation of setting foot on uncharted territories, where every horizon promises adventure and mystery.
  12. Stephen the Great's Funeral - A somber and reverent melody, paying homage to a legendary leader's final journey, filled with solemnity and reflection.
  13. Memories - A nostalgic and poignant composition, weaving through the tapestry of recollections, evoking both joyous reminiscences and wistful longing for times gone by.
  14. Rainy Slow Dance - A tender and intimate melody, embraced by the soft patter of raindrops, inviting moments of quiet reflection and heartfelt connection.
  15. Morning Moon and Me - A serene and introspective theme, accompanied by the gentle glow of the moon in the early morning sky, inspiring contemplation and tranquility.
  16. I'm not a Hero - A humble and introspective composition, exploring the inner journey of self-discovery and acceptance, amidst the tumult of life's trials and tribulations.
  17. Far from Home - A poignant and emotive melody, resonating with the bittersweet longing for distant places and cherished memories left behind, yet tinged with the hope of eventual reunion and new beginnings.



I hope this music pack will help you create an unforgettable atmosphere in your game!


Learn more about Evgheni:

evghenifloca.com
